title: incomplete documentation (regarding 4.5.1 developer pack)
body:
src\XMakeBuildEngine\Microsoft.Build.csproj uses things like "Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework.NETFramework\v4.5.1\Facades\System.Runtime.dll" which is included in 4.5.1 developer pack

however, it is not clear that 4.5.1 things have to be installed. it is not written anywhere

I suggest either to switch to 4.5.2 or to say that in documentation "you need 4.5.1 developer pack as well"

nodes.body: Cleaning up old issues, I don't think this is relevant anymore but thanks for reporting it.
